action.action-desc: Ms. Hahn (for herself, Mr. Kennedy, Mr. Hoyer, Ms. Brownley of California, Mrs. Napolitano, Ms. Roybal-Allard, Ms. Linda T. Sánchez of California, Mr. Cárdenas, Mr. Lowenthal, Mr. McCarthy of California, Mr. McKeon, Mr. Royce, Ms. Waters, Ms. Chu, Mr. Sherman, Mr. Waxman, Ms. Bass, Mrs. Negrete McLeod, Mr. Becerra, and Mr. Schiff) submitted the following resolution; which was referred to the Committee on Foreign Affairs

form.official-title: Celebrating the upcoming 2015 Special Olympics World Games in Los Angeles, California.

whereas.text: Whereas the Special Olympics changes attitudes and enhances the lives of millions of persons with disabilities;
Whereas the 2015 World Games will be held in the United States for the first time since 1999;
Whereas the 2015 World Games is predicted to draw over 7,000 athletes, 3,000 coaches, 30,000 volunteers, and 500,000 spectators from across the globe; and
Whereas the 2015 World Games in Los Angeles, California, will inspire and educate its participants, spectators, and a global audience: Now, therefore, be it

paragraph.text: supports the efforts of the coaches, educators, volunteers, leaders, and staff who make the Games possible; and
celebrates the return of the World Games to the United States and the City of Los Angeles.
